title: Alpitude custom Gardena Heritage ultralight carbon saddle, updated Stelvio GPS mounts & more…
content:
Handmade in the Italian Dolomites, component maker Alpitude adds a new customizable, limited edition Gardena Heritage saddle combining modern ultralight carbon construction with Italian leather finishing. Plus, their superlight Stelvio GPS mounts get much stronger without adding weight, now including GoPro or light mounts for one of the lightest multipurpose out-front mount setups anywhere… Alpitude

The post Alpitude custom Gardena Heritage ultralight carbon saddle, updated Stelvio GPS mounts & more… appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
